name: Master File - Not Otherwise Specified
description: General master file record update for data not covered by specific master file message types
hl7Reference: HL7 v2.3 Chapter 8 Master Files - HL7.eu/HL7v2x/v23/std23
businessPurpose: Distribute master file updates for reference data not covered by specific master file message types (M02-M06)
timing: Sent when master file records need to be synchronized across systems for general reference data
standardNotes: M01 is the generic master file message for data not fitting other specific types
MFI segment defines the master file being updated
MFE segment contains the specific record action (add, update, delete)
Z-segments (ZXX) carry the actual master file data content
Each institution defines Z-segment structure for their specific needs
realWorldScenarios: Hospital department list updates distributed to all clinical systems
Insurance plan master data synchronized across billing systems
Custom lookup tables updated for organization-specific reference data
Vendor master file updates for equipment or supply catalogs
Location master updates for room assignments and facility codes
Staff privilege codes updated for clinical access control systems

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - master file accuracy affects all downstream systems and processes
